description.original: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian. It allows you to open and annotate PDF and EPUB files.
description.translation: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian. It allows you to open and annotate PDF and EPUB files.

dict..setDesc(\"Whether to use annotation mod: .setDesc("Whether to use annotation mode by default when opening a note with annotation-target")
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to include the %%PREF: .setDesc("Whether to include the %%PREFIX%% region of the annotation markdown. Allows you to see some text before the highlighted region.")
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to include the %%POST: .setDesc("Whether to include the %%POSTFIX%% region of the annotation markdown. Allows you to see some text after the highlighted region.")
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to wrap the %%HIGHLIG: .setDesc("Whether to wrap the %%HIGHLIGHT%% region text in == ==, so that the text becomes highlighted. Useful for distinguishing the highlight from the pre- and postfix.")
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to use dark mode by d: .setDesc("Whether to use dark mode by default when opening pdfs/epubs.")
dict..setDesc(\"The amount of sepia in dark m: .setDesc("The amount of sepia in dark mode")
dict..setDesc(\"The amount of contrast in dar: .setDesc("The amount of contrast in dark mode")
dict..setDesc(\"The amount of brightness in d: .setDesc("The amount of brightness in dark mode")
dict..setDesc(\"Not bundled with the plugin d: .setDesc("Not bundled with the plugin due to potential copyright issues.")
dict..setDesc(\"If this is enabled, more thin: .setDesc("If this is enabled, more things are printed to the console.")
